channel.title: Client Help
channel.description:
I posted this in the client section but no one is answering :mad:
Ok, how to I make it so my client goes to my IP only?
PLEASE HELP!

item.title: Client Help
item.dc:creator: @Itachi_Uchiha Itachi Uchiha
item.description:
@Itachi_Uchiha wrote:

Open client.java and search for

public final URL getCodeBase()

You should see something like

return new URL("http://"itachi.no-ip.org":" + (80 + anInt958));

change that line to

return new URL("http://Your IP here:" + (Port here + anInt958));

Where it says Your IP here: put your ip there and your port where it says port here

Now find

if(anInt833 == 2) { int j = c1 / 2 - 40; if(aString1266.length() > 0) { aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub4_1272.method382(0xffff00, c / 2, anInt939, aString1266, j - 15, true); aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub4_1272.method382(0xffff00, c / 2, anInt939, aString1267, j, true); j += 30; } else {
Go down a few lines and make mental note marks before the server box code (//),

//aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub4_1272.method389(false, true, c / 2 - 90, 0x1C86EE, "@or1@Server: " + server + ((anInt1216 == 2) & (anInt1105 % 40 < 20) ? "@or1@|" : "@dre@"), j); //j += 15;

Read full topic
